body_html:
@peterjc123
New problem ...
````RuntimeError: CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_SUPPORTED. This error may appear if you passed in a non-contiguous input.```

Works great on Linux, exact same code.
https://github.com/QuantScientist/Deep-Learning-Boot-Camp/blob/master/day02-PyTORCH-and-PyCUDA/PyTorch/18-PyTorch-NUMER.AI-Binary-Classification-BCELoss-0.691839667509%20.ipynb

#967
https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/resolved-batchnorm1d-cudnn-status-not-supported/3049/7

I have CUDA 8 and CuDNN 6, which versions did you use?

@peterjc123

Works great on Linux, exact same code.
